references: Handbook of Number Theory, D. S. Mitrinovic et al., Kluwer, Section IV.1.
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
formula: a(n) = Pi^2/12 * n^2/log n + O(n^2/log^2 n). - _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Feb 19 2014
prog: (Haskell)a046670 n = a046670_list !! (n-1)a046670_list = scanl1 (+) a006530_list -- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jun 15 2013(PARI) gpf(n)=if(n<4,n,n=factor(n)[,1];n[#n])a(n)=sum(k=1,n,gpf(k)) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Feb 19 2014
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
